Dole Resources, Recipes and Recommendations for GLP-1 Medications GLP-1 medications are changing how people think about weight loss and blood sugar management, but food still matters. Discover how fresh fruits and vegetables can play a practical, satisfying role alongside this medication, with recipes, tips, and real-world guidance designed for everyday life. Monthly Nutrition News Articles Treat yourself to inspiring ideas, learn why it's important to get enough exercise, and find out more about the various nutrients in fruit and vegetables. 2023 Dole plc Sustainability Report For over 170 years, we have been as proud to deliver nutritious, high-quality produce all around the world, as we have been to take responsibility for the land from which it is grown. And we are equally committed to supporting and enhancing the global communities that ensure we can produce and deliver the quality produce we are known for. The Dole Way is our enduring commitment to grow, process and distribute our produce responsibly- today and for generations to come.
